Package main.user

Class DataList

  • Object
    • DataList
  • public class DataList
extends Object
    A database that stores all the existing user objects in the system.
    Since:
    2023-11-24
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      ArrayList<User> staffList
      This DataList's array of staffs.
      ArrayList<User> studentList
      This DataList's array of students.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataList()
      This DataList's constructor, tries to read in any existing information that could have been stored from previous runs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataList

        public DataList()

    • Method Detail

      • updateUser

        public User updateUser​(String name,
                       User user)
        Replaces a user object within this User Database's list of users. This should be used whenever a student registers to be a camp committee member, because he is upgraded to a camp commmittee object. Hence this change should be reflected in the User DataBase as well.

        Example: dataList.updateUser(currentUser.getName(),currentUser.registerCampCommittee("campName"));

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user object to be replaced.
        user - The new user object to replace the old user object.
        Returns:
        The original user object that was passed in as a parameter.

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints​(String name)
        Given a user's name, finds the user and adds points to it. Will not add points if the user is not a camp commmittee member.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of student to add points to.

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints​(String name)
        Gets the number of points that a user has. Only a camp committee member has points, and function will return -1 if it fails.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of user whose points we want to attain.
        Returns:
        Number of points. Returns -1 if user is not a camp committee member.

      • containsStudent

        public boolean containsStudent​(String username)
        Checks if a student is inside this DataList's array of students.
        Parameters:
        username - The student's name.
        Returns:
        True if the student is in the array of students. Returns false otherwise.

      • getStudentPassword

        public String getStudentPassword​(String username)
        Gets a student's password from this DataList's student array.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the student's whose password is to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The student's password.

      • getStudentName

        public String getStudentName​(String username)
        Gets the student's name from the datalist, given his username.
        Parameters:
        username - The student's username.
        Returns:
        The student's corresponding name.

      • containsStaff

        public boolean containsStaff​(String username)
        Checks if this DataList's Staff array contains a staff with a given username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns true of the username is in this DataList's array. Returns false otherwise.

      • getStaffPassword

        public String getStaffPassword​(String username)
        Gets the staff's password, given his username, from this DataList's staff array.
        Parameters:
        username - The staff's username whose password is to be obtained
        Returns:
        Returns the password if the staff is in this DataList's list. Else returns null.

      • getStaffName

        public String getStaffName​(String username)
        Gets a staff's name from this DataList's staff array, given his username.
        Parameters:
        username - The staff's username, who name is to be obtained.
        Returns:
        The staff's corresponding name. If the username is not found in the DataList's staff array, null is returned.

      • getStudent

        public User getStudent​(String username)
        Gets a student object, given his username.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the student object to be attained.
        Returns:
        The user object with the corresponding username, in this DataList's student array. Returns null if student is not found.

      • getStaff

        public User getStaff​(String username)
        Gets a staff object, given his username.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the staff object to be attained.
        Returns:
        The user object with the corresponding username, in this DataList's staff array. Returns null if staff is not found.

      • setNewStudentPasswordWithInput

        public void setNewStudentPasswordWithInput​(String username,
                                           String newPassword)
        Changes a student's password.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the student object whose password is to be changed in this DataList's student array.
        newPassword - The new password.

      • setNewStaffPasswordWithInput

        public void setNewStaffPasswordWithInput​(String username,
                                         String newPassword)
        Changes a staff's password
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the staff object whose password is to be changed in this DataList's staff array.
        newPassword - The new password.

      • writeStudentToStorage

        public void writeStudentToStorage()
                           throws IOException
        Writes this DataList's array of student entries into a txt file. This should be called at the end of the application in order to save the database into a file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws an exception if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.

      • readStudentFromStorage

        public void readStudentFromStorage()
                            throws IOException,
                                   ClassNotFoundException
        Searches for the designated storage txt file to read in student list data from previous app runs, and adds those student objects to the student list array this DataList database. If there is no storage file, does not read in anything and no new student entries are added to the student array in this database.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if unable to find class that we are trying to reference.

      • writeStaffToStorage

        public void writeStaffToStorage()
                         throws IOException
        Writes this DataList's array of staff entries into a txt file. This should be called at the end of the application in order to save the database into a file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws an exception if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.

      • readStaffFromStorage

        public void readStaffFromStorage()
                          throws IOException,
                                 ClassNotFoundException
        Searches for the designated storage txt file to read in staff list data from previous app runs, and adds those staff objects to the staff list array this DataList database. If there is no storage file, does not read in anything and no new staff entries are added to the staff array in this database.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if it is unable to find the file to read or write to.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if unable to find class that we are trying to reference.
